content: k all row 10 k2 p17 k2 repeat row 9&10 for 34cm row 11 *k3 p3* to end row 12 *p3 k3* to end repeat row 11&12 eight times 16 row total row 13 *k1 k2tog p3* three times k3 18 sts row 14 p1 p2tog k1 k2tog *p2 k1 k2tog* twice p2 14 sts row 15 *k2 p2* to end row 16 *p2 k2* to end repeat row 13&14 twice 4 row total row 17 *k1 k2tog* four times k2 10 sts row 18 k2tog to end 5 sts k all row for 30cm bind off 2 finishing weave in all ends block your headband if the edges roll in steam block if you used acrylic yarn otherwise wet block by spraying it or gently soaking it in lukewarm water dry flat instagram @madebym ka this pattern is for personal use only please do not copy sell or distribute this pattern in any way if you want to sell product s made from this pattern please tag/mention me @madebym ka on instagram to show respect for the original creator if you have a fo of this project feel free to tag me too thank you for your understanding 3
